---
title: "Contact Us"
format:
  html:
    theme: default
server: shiny
---
```{r setup}
library(shiny)
```

```{r ui,}
shinyUI (fluidPage(
  headerPanel(title = "Leave a Comment"), 
  sidebarPanel(
    textInput("Name", "Enter your name"), 
    textInput("Comment", "Let us know what you think!")
  ), 
  mainPanel(
    textOutput("Name"), 
    textOutput("Comment")
  )
))
```

```{r}
#| context: server
shinyServer(function (input, output) {
  output$Name <- {(
    renderText(input$Name)
  )}
  output$Coment <- {(
    renderText(input$Comment)
  )}
}
  )

```
